item.title: $eta$-DPO: Direct Preference Optimization with Dynamic $eta$
item.description: Œ≤-DPO dynamically adjusts a key parameter in Direct Preference Optimization, significantly improving LLM alignment with human preferences.

item.title: Federated Fine-tuning of Large Language Models under Heterogeneous Tasks and Client Resources
item.description: FlexLoRA: Efficient Federated Fine-tuning of LLMs for Heterogeneous Tasks and Resources.

item.title: MoGenTS: Motion Generation based on Spatial-Temporal Joint Modeling
item.description: MoGenTS revolutionizes human motion generation by quantizing individual joints into 2D tokens, enabling efficient spatial-temporal modeling and significantly outperforming existing methods.

item.title: SlimGPT: Layer-wise Structured Pruning for Large Language Models
item.description: SlimGPT: Achieve near-optimal LLM structured pruning via Batched Greedy Pruning and Incremental Pruning Ratio, improving efficiency without sacrificing accuracy.
